overview:
Richard has been with Mobile Interactive Group (“MIG”) since January 2005 and has managed the growth of MIG from its early stages to the leading mobile marketing services organisation in the UK.

Richard qualified as a chartered accountant at PricewaterhouseCoopers (“PwC”, then Price Waterhouse) where he subsequently progressed to Senior Manager in the firm’s Transaction Services group, advising corporate and private equity clients in the Telecoms and IT sectors on M&A activities. Since leaving PwC in 2000, Richard has worked in senior management positions spanning financial, operational and commercial roles for high growth businesses in the internet and telecoms sector.

Between 2002 and 2005, Richard worked as Operations Director at Eposs (a subsidiary of Western Union Financial Services, Inc, owned by First Data Corp) a payment solutions business for mobile top-up and mobile entertainment services.

Richard is on the board of Mobile Interactive Group and its subsidiary companies, 4th Screen Advertising and Jigsaw, and is responsible for the financial and operational strategy across the group.
